name: La La Loopsy
description:
La La Loopsy is a platformer game where you play as Loopsy, a cute mushroom farmer who is stuck in a forest full of horror. Can you help Loopsy find his way home?

Note: sometimes you have to click the windows key to get the mouse to appear

Sound Assets Used:

- Power Up sound:

    https://soundimage.org/sfx-pwrupdn/

- Horror Background music:

     https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/the-magic-tree

- Cute Background music:

    https://www.purple-planet.com/cute

- Other SFX we made ourselves
